subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Derek Jeter made his first trip to Cleveland as the Yankees’ shortstop, he was 21. The team was hoping for solid defense and a decent batting average. Jeter hoped for more.
snippet: When Derek Jeter made his first trip to Cleveland as the Yankees’ shortstop, he was 21. The team was hoping for solid defense and a decent batting average. Jeter hoped for more.
